catentdesc.name: Hermitage Straight Leg Denim Jeans
catentdesc.longdescription: A regular pair of jeans for your boy in dark blue, they are straight legged and have a distressed finish. Whisker washed for a faded effect, the comfortable fit makes him look tall and lean. A white shirt goes very well with these jeans.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Black Bootcut Jeans
catentdesc.longdescription: These black bootcut jeans have a sheen due to the enzyme wash. Suitable for any occasion, they can be worn with a formal shirt or a t-shirt. Made of premium denim, these jeans last forever.

catentdesc.name: Borsati Blue Carpenter Jeans
catentdesc.longdescription: These carpenter style jeans for kiddie boys are loose around the legs and convenient to put on. They have a stonewashed look providing a fashionable appearance. They make ideal play pants.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Flared Denim Jeans
catentdesc.longdescription: This pair of flared denim jeans in blue have a sandblasted finish with a bootcut leg. The designer patch at the leg and near the pocket make up a trendy appearance. The pronounced side seams further add to the effect.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Blue Straight Leg Jeans
catentdesc.longdescription: Another version of the vintage style jeans, these are stone washed with an emphasis around the knees. They are essential in a boy 's wardrobe as they can withstand wear and tear and last a long time.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Carpenter Jeans
catentdesc.longdescription: These carpenter jeans with a side pocket are roomy and comfortable. Made of durable soft cotton denim, the seams halfway down the leg add to the dashing look.Match them with a fashionable t-shirt and see your boy become popular.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Classic Wide-Legged Jeans
catentdesc.longdescription: Classic and stylish in navy blue, these are loose-fitting jeans with distinct contrast-colored seams on the legs. They are wide-legged to allow for easy pull-on. Good for fall, team them with a full-sleeved crew neck t-shirt.

catentdesc.name: Borsati Gray Fleece Pants
catentdesc.longdescription: These stretchable, soft pair of pants made of cotton spandex blend, are ideal baby pants. They are machine washable with an elastic waistband and a dark gray lining down the length for a stylish look.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Blue Torn Jeans
catentdesc.longdescription: A rugged torn pair of jeans for the tough boys, these will look extremely cute on your tiny tot. The tears and creases on the jeans appear natural and cool. Match them with a belt and a sleeveless t-shirt to complete the rough look.
